hero.title: Experience the Best of Cyprus Waters
hero.subtitle: Fishing charters, boat rentals, and unforgettable marine adventures in Larnaca

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From fishing trips to boat maintenance, we've got you covered

fishingCharters.title: Fishing Charters
fishingCharters.shortDescription: Experience world-class fishing in the Mediterranean with our expert captains
fishingCharters.description: Join us for an unforgettable fishing adventure in the crystal-clear waters of Cyprus. Our experienced captains know the best spots for catching grouper, sea bream, tuna, and more.

boatRentals.title: Boat Rentals
boatRentals.shortDescription: Rent quality boats for your perfect day on the water
boatRentals.description: Choose from our fleet of well-maintained boats, perfect for family outings, romantic getaways, or fishing trips. No captain needed with proper licensing.

privateCruises.title: Private Cruises & Events
privateCruises.shortDescription: Celebrate special occasions with a private cruise along the coast
privateCruises.description: Create unforgettable memories with a private cruise. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, corporate events, or just a special day out with friends and family.

maintenance.title: Boat Maintenance
maintenance.shortDescription: Professional cleaning and maintenance services for your vessel
maintenance.description: Keep your boat in top condition with our comprehensive maintenance services. From regular cleaning to engine servicing, we handle it all.

fishingLessons.title: Fishing Lessons
fishingLessons.shortDescription: Learn fishing techniques from experienced local fishermen
fishingLessons.description: Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to improve your skills, our fishing lessons cover everything from basic techniques to advanced methods.

spearfishing.title: Spearfishing Trips
spearfishing.shortDescription: Guided spearfishing adventures for all skill levels
spearfishing.description: Discover the thrill of spearfishing in Cyprus's pristine waters. Our guides will take you to the best spots and teach you proper techniques.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Buy and sell boats, fishing gear, and marine accessories

booking.title: Book Your Experience
booking.confirmationMessage: Thank you for your booking! We'll contact you shortly to confirm the details.

about.title: About Boat Mania
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for marine adventures in Cyprus
about.storyText: Founded in Larnaca, Boat Mania started with a simple passion: sharing the beauty of Cyprus's waters with everyone. What began as a small fishing charter operation has grown into a full-service marine company, offering everything from boat rentals to maintenance services.
about.missionText: To provide unforgettable marine experiences while maintaining the highest standards of safety, service, and environmental responsibility.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch for bookings and inquiries

footer.description: Your premier destination for fishing charters, boat rentals, and marine services in Larnaca, Cyprus.
